original_text: Your people, the Israelites, are saying: “The Lord is not fair in the things that he does!” But it is the people themselves who live in a way that is not fair.
korean_text: 그래도 네 민족은 말하기를 주의 길이 바르지 아니하다 하는도다 그러나 실상은 그들의 길이 바르지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Your people, the Israelites, are saying:
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 백성인 이스라엘 사람들이 말하고 있습니다:

sentences.original_text: in the things that he does!
But it is the people themselves
who live in a way that is not fair.
